title: Dreaming of Mr. Darcy
description: A Romance Worthy of Jane Austen HerselfPraise for A Weekend with Mr. Darcy :"Sunshine on a rainy day. A charmingly written slice of warmhearted escapism." — Lisa Jewell, bestselling author of Roommates Wanted"Lively, funny characters ... the romances of this novel brilliantly reveal one thing that Miss Austen always true love is often a complicated, but beautiful, mess." — Luxury ReadingFledging illustrator and Darcy fanatic Kay Ashton settles in the seaside town of Lyme to finish her book, The Illustrated Darcy, when a film company arrives to make a new adaptation of Jane Austen's Persuasion . Kay is soon falling for the handsome bad boy actor playing Captain Wentworth, but it's the quiet screenwriter Adam Craig who has more in common with her beloved Mr. Darcy. Though still healing from a broken heart, Adam finds himself unexpectedly in love with Kay. But it will take more than good intentions to convince her that her real happy ending is with him.
author: Victoria Connelly
